DOC.brief_summary: The objective study measure energy value walnuts human diet study molecular mechanism may help explain beneficial health effect walnuts . The hypothesis less metabolizable energy walnut due decrease fat digestibility .
DOC.brief_title: The Measured Energy Value Walnuts Human Diet
DOC.detailed_description: Previous study demonstrate nut consumption imparts variety health benefit , include reduction cardiovascular disease improve satiety . The aim study determine energy value walnuts human diet probe mechanism walnuts impart health benefit . The metabolizable energy value walnut calculate base chemical composition energy content consume diet excreta . This provide good estimate energy value walnuts simply calculate energy value base Atwater factor . In addition determine energy value walnut , evaluate effect walnut-rich diet plasma phytonutrient level gene expression change determine protective mechanism activate walnut consumption .
DOC.criteria: Age 25 65 year begin study Body mass index 20 38 kg/m2 Fasting glucose < 126 mg/dl Blood pressure < 160/100 ( control certain medication ) Fasting total blood cholesterol < 280 mg/dl Fasting triglycerides < 300 mg/dl Presence kidney disease , liver disease , gout , hyperthyroidism , untreated unstable hypothyroidism , certain cancer , gastrointestinal disease , pancreatic disease , metabolic disease , malabsorption syndrome Women give birth previous 12 month Pregnant woman woman plan become pregnant become pregnant study Lactating woman Type 2 diabetes require use oral antidiabetic agent insulin History bariatric certain surgery relate weight control Smokers tobacco user ( 6 month prior start study ) Antibiotic use intervention 3 week prior intervention period History eat disorder dietary pattern consistent dietary intervention ( e.g. , vegetarian , low fat diet , high protein diet ) Volunteers lose 10 % body weight within last 12 month Known ( selfreported ) allergy adverse reaction walnut nut Unable unwilling give inform consent communicate study staff Selfreport alcohol substance abuse within past 12 month and/or current acute treatment rehabilitation program problem ( longterm participation Alcoholics Anonymous exclusion ) Other medical , psychiatric , behavioral factor judgment Principal Investigator may interfere study participation ability follow intervention protocol
